episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4001_1001_01: You lost it somewhere around here, right?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4001_1001_03: Sorry to make you look with me, Brendan.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4001_1001_04: No worries! We’ll find it as soon as possible!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4001_1001_06: Hmm... I don’t see it anywhere.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4001_1001_07: Hey, are you two maybe looking for...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/6801_1001_01: An adventure in a new world is always exciting!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/6801_1001_03:
I hope we get to find our greatest treasure on
Pasio, too!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_03: Seems that book means a lot to you.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_04:
Yes! I’d like to give you something in return.
Oh, my name’s Wally, by the way.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_05:
Thanks for finding it! I’m Brendan! What’s
your name?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_06: I’m Florian. I came here from the Paldea region.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_07:
Oh, Paldea! That’s where they have that big
school, right? Are you perhaps...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_10:
Since you seem to love books...do you like
studying for school?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_12: Yes! I’m excited for Pasio Academy!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_13: They’re opening a school here, too, huh.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_15: You should come with us, Florian!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_17: By the way, do you have any friends on Pasio?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_18:
Nope. I just got here. You two are the first
I’ve met.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_19: I don’t think anyone knows I’m here yet.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_20:
All right! Then we stake our claim as your
first friends!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_22:
OK then. We should introduce you to our
other friend!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_25: No, I think she’s off somewhere else today.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_26: But we have Latios, so it’d be a short trip!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_27: You mean by riding that Pokémon?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_30: I have my own trusty partner.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_35: Miraidon can fly pretty fast, too!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4002_1001_36: So come on, Brendan! Wally! Let’s head out!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4003_1001_02: I’m tired from all that walking.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4003_1001_03: How about we take a Pokéblocks break?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4003_1001_05: I mixed in some tasty Berries!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_01: A Pokémon?! Where did it come from?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_03: OK, I’ll share some with you.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_04: *chuckle* You two sure have big appetites.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_06: Quite the glutton, aren’t you. As usual.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_07: Sorry it ate your Pokémon’s snack!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_08: I have plenty, so no worries!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_09: Here, I’ll give you this sandwich instead.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_10: You too?! But you just ate!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_11: Ahaha! You two are such good friends! But, um...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_12: I’m Juliana! And this is Koraidon!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_13: I’m May! And this is Latias! Nice to meet you!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_15:
Yup! It’s my partner I traveled around
Paldea with!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_16:
I rode on its back, and we went all kinds
of places!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_17: Oh, just like us! Right, Latias?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_18: Come to think of it, the way Latias and I met...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_19: It was just like how I met your Koraidon.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_21:
Yeah, Latias came up to me while I was giving
some Pokémon Pokéblocks.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_22:
We continued to hang out together and became
good friends. And eventually, we became a
sync pair!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_23:
Does that mean both Latias and Koraidon love
to eat?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_25: See! I knew they’d be here!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_27: Whaaa—?! What are you all doing here?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_28: We saw Koraidon in the sky, so we followed it!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_29:
We thought maybe it meant you were here on
Pasio, Juliana!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_30: Long time no see, Juliana! Now let’s get into it.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_32: Shouldn’t we talk more before battling?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_33: But this is how we say hello!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_34: Are all of you Juliana’s friends?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_35: Yep! I’m Arven, Juliana’s best bud!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_37: Um, stop trying to flex on each other.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_39: Oh, sounds like my friends just arrived, too! Heeey!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_40:
Let me introduce them to you all! This is Brendan
and Wally!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_44: Oh, OK. I think I get it.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_45: Hey, Arven, Penny. You don’t recognize me either?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_46: Um, are you a student from Naranja Academy?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_47: Hmmm. Not sure I’ve seen you around.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4004_1001_48: Naranja Academy? I’ve never heard of that school.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_02: A parallel universe! Multiple worlds coexisting!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_03:
Which means...this place is neither the future
nor the past!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_04: I’m so glad I jumped through that weird ring!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_06: Wow, you sure are hyped all of a sudden.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_07: I vibe with his energy, though.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_09: I’m Florian—a student from Uva Academy!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_10:
This is just a theory, but I think Uva Academy
and Naranja Academy are one and the same.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_12: Are they not all from the same school?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_16: Could you tell us about your journey in Paldea?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_17:
Once we hear your story, I think everything will
become clear!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_18: Oh, uh... OK! I’ll keep it brief.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_19:
So after I moved to Paldea, I started attending
the academy.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_20:
I met Koraidon on the beach and did a Treasure
Hunt as part of our independent study.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_22:
Then I became friends with Nemona, Arven, and
Penny, and we all ventured into Area Zero.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_24: I had the same experience in my universe!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_27: Like the names of our schools, for example.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_28:
And it was Miraidon I met on the beach,
not Koraidon.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_29: That’s why I figured they’re parallel universes.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_30:
I think I came from a different Paldea than you
all did!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_31:
But I don’t have any proof, so I wouldn’t blame
you if you don’t believe me.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_32:
Yeah, there’s no way I’d believe that
bonkers story...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_33:
is what I WOULD say, but after the whole thing
with Area Zero...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_35: I do see how Koraidon and Miraidon are similar.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_36:
Soooo...Florian had the same experience as me?
Except he’s a boy and has a Miraidon?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_37: Oh no, Juliana’s brain is overheating.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_38: Hmm. A world that’s a little different...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_39: I think I’ve heard a similar story before.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4005_1001_41:
Hope for our world... Tragedy for another...
You get it, don’t you?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_01: He’s right about the different universes!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_04: There’s a different Hoenn from the one we know...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_05: A Hoenn where Mega Evolution doesn’t exist!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_07:
Plus, I think there are people on Pasio in a similar
situation as you, Florian.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_09:
Yeah! That’s why I think what Florian’s saying
isn’t nonsense!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_10: Yeah, you’re right. I think so too!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_11:
I’ve met others with connections to other worlds,
too—like Koraidon.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_12: So I believe what Florian says!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_14:
You’re so strong, Florian. Aren’t you scared of
an unknown world?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_16:
Because I made a promise to the Nemona and
others in my universe!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_18:
A promise that once I find my new treasure in this
universe, I’ll return for sure!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_19:
I couldn’t hold back my desire to explore an
unknown world.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_20: And everyone sent me off with encouragement.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_21: I could probably go back whenever I want, but...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_22:
First I wanna find a treasure that’s special to
Pasio—a treasure that will amaze everyone!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_23: I think I understand how that version of us felt!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_24:
Yeah. If Juliana said the same, I think we’d cheer
her on, too.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_25:
Yup, especially if it’s the path my closest
buddy chose.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_26: I see. So even when you’re apart...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_27: you’re still connected with the friends you love!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_30: If we were best buds in your universe...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_31: then we’re best buds here, too!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_32: Uh, who are you flexing on?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_33:
Um... You can count on me for things like
computer stuff here, too.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_34:
Hey, hey! So this means you’re just as strong as
Juliana, right, Florian?!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_35: You should be my rival in this universe, too!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_36: You all haven’t changed, have you.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_39:
I guess their friendship hasn’t changed, even
though they’re from different universes.
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_40: I made so many friends today!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_41: Speaking of friends, even our Pokémon...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_46: Stop it, both of you! Aghhhhhh!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_47: Hahaha! Looks like you’re their favorite, Penny!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_48: Miraidon, huh? I’m SO excited to battle you!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_50: What if she’s a machine, like Miraidon?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_51: Yeah, maybe she has endless stamina. Scary...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_52: Hahaha! I’d like to see that!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_54: Don’t forget we’re your new friends, too!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_55: Of course! Brendan and Wally, right?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_56: May tells me you’re reliable Pokémon Trainers!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_58:
Oh, since Florian and Juliana have just arrived on
Pasio...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_59: Why don’t we show them around the island?
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_60: I’m all in! All right, everyone! Follow me!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_61:
“Follow me”? Where are you taking us?! And that
sparkle in your eye...
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_62: No need to rush, Nemona! Let’s eat first!
episode_event_ch0286_ch0287/4006_1001_63:
Now, now. We’ve plenty of time to go all kinds
of places.
